page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: St.Michels (our school) is a group 4 Church of England Primary School (aided) of about 250 pupils from 5-11 years of age.With 7 teachers and a Headmistress it is one of the larger primary schools in the area. Many of our pupils will transfer at eleven years to Carr Hill High School ,(the only comprehensive school nearby).About eight children from forty five leavers in 1985 will go to independent schools - mainly Kirkham Grammar School.Secondary education will end for many at 16 years ,others will stay on for extra years and then go on further education. At the moment school leavers are having difficulty finding employment and the government are providing schemes of industrial and commercial training.
